name: LINE CHEF
description:
Brown is a foodie who also loves to cook, and he dreams of opening his own restaurant! Team up with Brown and Sally, who've started a food truck business in order to make their dreams come true, and become a top chef!

LINE CHEF is a new type of super-cute cooking game you'll definitely enjoy! Playing is as simple as tapping the screen! Chef Brown is mega busy serving all those cute, charming, and...well, let's just say, "unique" customers, so he needs your help! Lend Brown a hand serving delicious meals to customers and make his dream come true!


LINE CHEF Features
・ A variety of shops appear in the game, and they're all really cute!
・ Prepare cuisines from a variety of countries! You'll feel like you're traveling around the world!
・ Tons of cute customers will come to your Shop to eat!
・ Many kinds of ways to play, such as Like, Serve, and Score stages!
・ Just tap the screen to play! Basic play is free and is fun for everyone, from children to adults!
・ Collect Coins to upgrade your meals and kitchen!
・ Get big Combos for crazy Coins!
・ Your cute Buddies will use their skills to help you in the kitchen!
・ Send Chocolates to friends and you'll get little gifts!
・ Pancakes, pasta, cafe meals, steak... New shops with new dishes keep on coming!
・ Play with your favorite characters, including Brown, Sally, Cony, and Choco! Have fun with LINE characters!


LINE CHEF is for you if:
・ You like cooking games
・ You like tasty dishes such as hamburg steaks and omelet rice
・ You like LINE characters such as Brown, Sally, and Cony
・ You like LINE games such as PokoPoko, Pokopang, Rangers, Bubble 2, etc.
・ You like cooking
・ You're a foodie

Aim to become a top chef in this cooking game with cute LINE characters!
Download the cute and exciting LINE CHEF now!
